hero.title: Stress-Free Invoicing for Federal Contractors
hero.description: We work behind the scenes to keep your invoicing compliant, your payments on track, and your focus on what you do best.

about.title: Keep Your Business Moving
about.description: Our mission is simple—make life easier for federal contractors. We manage your invoicing workflows and compliance headaches, so you can focus on delivering great work and winning more contracts, not chasing down payments.

steps.title: Notify Us
steps.description: Send us an update when the job is done.

steps.title: Sit Back and Relax
steps.description: We handle everything from compliance to follow-up.

steps.title: Get Paid
steps.description: No delays. No errors. Just fast, accurate payments.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Full support—for less than a full-time hire. Think of us as your secret invoicing department.

list.title: Invoice Submissions
list.description: We enter and submit invoices directly into WAWF or other required portals, ensuring accuracy, compliance, and timely processing.

list.title: Invoice Tracking
list.description: We monitor invoice status across all stages—submission, acceptance, approval, and payment—so nothing falls through the cracks.

list.title: Reporting
list.description: We deliver clear, customized reports that give you visibility into submitted, pending, and paid invoices—plus trends and payment timelines.

list.title: Liaison Support
list.description: We communicate with CORs, DFAS, and payment offices on your behalf to resolve issues, follow up on delays, and keep payments moving.

contact.title: Take the First Step
contact.description: Stress-free invoicing is one message away.
